prompts: Create a fierce fire-type Pokemon with a flaming tail and sharp claws.
Imagine a bipedal creature that breathes fire, with orange and cream scales.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a small lizard to a powerful dragon.
Show me a middle-stage Pokemon that has a passionate and aggressive personality.
Generate a Pokemon with dynamic poses, showcasing its agility and fiery spirit.
Make a Pokemon with vibrant red and white patterns, reminiscent of a blazing flame.
Give me a unique Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and forests.
